Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Just got the game today after playing the demo yesterday and am really enjoying it, just messing around in sand box mode and have managed after a few attempts to get something into space ...... I don't think its ever coming back again though. lol. Also brand new to these forums although been on the Forza Motorsport ones for years and just wanted to check I could post.

Cheers
Thanks, so its a few days in (4) and I have amassed 104 crash folders that I wants me to send to the developers. Should they all be sent via email ? and to what address ?

Hi, welcome aboard.

About all those crashes, please send a mail to [email protected]
